meanings.definition: Pay attention to; take notice of.
meanings.sent2: He always heeds the warning signs.
meanings.sent3: The cat heeds the sound of a can opener.
meanings.sent4: The tree heeds the changing seasons.
meanings.sent5: The student heeds the teacher's instructions carefully.

meanings.sent2: She heeds the opinions of experts.
meanings.sent3: The dog heeds the call of its owner.
meanings.sent4: The flower heeds the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The team heeds the coach's game plan.
